isis.stitle: DT 466 / DT 570 / HT 570 Service Manual - 2004 Emissions with EGR - Power Cylinders - Removal - Cylinder Sleeve Removal

note.para: Before installing the puller, bar the engine over so the crankshaft journal is located at the bottom (low point) of its travel. This prevents possible damage to the journal by the puller lifting jaws during puller installation.
When you remove the sleeve from puller, mark the sleeve with its cylinder bore number. Also mark the sleeve position in the engine block for the purposes of inspection and assembly.

step1.para: Position the cylinder sleeve puller in the sleeve and spread the lifting jaws so the tangs grip the bottom of the sleeve .
With the lifting bridge firmly on the crankcase top deck, turn the forcing nut to break the cylinder sleeve loose from the crankcase.
Lift sleeve and puller from the crankcase.
Use a pic to remove the crevice seal at the lower counterbore area of each cylinder sleeve. Discard crevice seal.
